short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly export WhatsApp group Contactss and chat lists to CSV or Excel formats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WA Contacts Extractor is an efficient tool that simplifies the process of exporting WhatsApp contacts. Whether you're managing group contacts or chat lists, this extension allows you to quickly export your data with ease. It supports multiple formats including CSV, Excel, and JSON, making it versatile for various data handling needs.

Key Features:

✅ Export WhatsApp group and chat contacts effortlessly.
✅ Supports CSV, Excel, and JSON formats for flexible data management.
✅ Easy-to-use interface for a smooth user experience.
✅ Perfect for organizing and managing contacts for both personal and professional purposes.

Take control of your WhatsApp contacts with WA Contacts Extractor!
